value.name: Officials identify Cleveland police officer, man he killed in Thursday-morning shooting
value.description: Cleveland police officer Daniel Piper, a 10-year veteran, shot and killed Innes Lee Jr., 25, Thursday morning on the city’s East Side. Piper and several other Fourth District police officers ...

value.name: Man fatally shot by Cleveland police Thursday was wanted for 2 crimes, including murder
value.description: 1. It’s a bizarre twist of fate for 25-year-old Innes Lee, Jr. of Cleveland. Lee was shot and killed on Thursday when he pulled a gun on Cleveland Police. Bodycam video showed the intense moments.
